segments.advisor_message: So, uh, let's say, like, you own, um, a classic car, right? And, uh, it's worth, I dunno, let's say fifty thousand dollars right now. What would you, eh, estimate you paid for it when you got it?
segments.client_message: Oh, that car? Yeah, I bought it ages ago for, uh, around twenty-five thousand, I think. It was a good deal back then. It's just, like, super valuable now because, uh, collectors love it. Just make sure you, um, note that!
